welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Syston, UK! Get ready to experience the charming, quaint town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Syston has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
